description: Triggered when the user receive a new Direct Message.

configSchema.name: mustMatch
configSchema.description: The message must match the given regex to be counted as a trigger, using this variable enable the Matches[i] placeholder to be used

placeholders.name: Author
placeholders.description: The '@' of the author of the direct message (ex: @twitter)

placeholders.name: AuthorDisplayName
placeholders.description: The display name of the author of the direct message (ex: 'Twitter')

placeholders.name: AuthorId
placeholders.description: The id of the author of the direct message

placeholders.name: Message
placeholders.description: The content of the direct message

placeholders.name: Words[i]
placeholders.description: The word at index i in the message.

placeholders.name: NbWords
placeholders.description: The number of words in the Words array

placeholders.name: Matches[i]
placeholders.description: The match at index i in the regex. /!\ Can only be used if mustMatch was given

placeholders.name: NbMatches
placeholders.description: The number of matches in the Matches array

placeholders.name: MatchesGroups[i]
placeholders.description: The match group at index i in the regex. /!\ Can only be used if mustMatch was given

placeholders.name: NbMatchesGroups
placeholders.description: The number of matches groups in the MatchesGroupes array
